clinical_history: Assessment for renal calculus or hydronephrosis.
technique: Longitudinal, transverse, and oblique views obtained.
findings: Urinary bladder is ill-defined, no intraluminal lesions.
Breast tissue shows hypoechoic lesion measuring 35.21 mm.
Major vessels show ill-defined waveform on Doppler.
Gallbladder shows mildly heterogeneous, no stones or wall thickening.
No evidence of DVT; veins compressible with normal flow.
Common bile duct measures 30.5 mm, within normal limits.
Fetal cardiac activity present with FHR 21.25 bpm.
